name: Word Salad
description:
Word Salad

Make a salad out of words!

A toy more than a game, simply select the food you want to add to your plate, and place as much as you want.

The result will either be a nice wordcloud in the shape of a salad, or a big physics filled mess. I won't tell you what to do.

Royalty free music by Bensound

Uses Kwanchangnim's "Jello Physics"
